dc:title: Preface" to The Catholic Worker(1933-1961)</I
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Gives a brief account of the accomplishments of the C.W. and its consistent themes of personalism, pacifism, God's love for the poor, and common good. Tells how it was done and how it will continue.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 29 1970-01-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
